238569a64d7dbd252e3b27204f207e8a85481097.query:

            WHERE user_id = (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $3)
            AND key = $4

2b319a202bb983d5f28979d1e371f399125da112.query:
--  mark a notification as read
UPDATE mcaptcha_notifications
    SET read = TRUE
WHERE 
    mcaptcha_notifications.id = $1
AND
    mcaptcha_notifications.rx = (
        SELECT
            id
        FROM
            mcaptcha_users
        WHERE
        name = $2
    );

4303f5c6ef98e0de9d8d3c2d781d3ffaa3dee5f7.query:

            WHERE 
                config_id = (
                    SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config 
                WHERE 
                    key = $1
                AND
                     user_id = (
                        SELECT 
                            ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2))
                ORDER BY time DESC

              heading, message, tx, rx)

61523f76efade451db9db38cf4c8092af7489a90.query:

        config_id,
        avg_traffic,
        peak_sustainable_traffic,
        broke_my_site_traffic
    ) VALUES ( 
         (SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config 
          WHERE
            key = ($1)
          AND user_id = (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2)
         ), $3, $4, $5)

c2e167e56242de7e0a835e25004b15ca8340545f.query:
SELECT 
          avg_traffic, 
          peak_sustainable_traffic, 
          broke_my_site_traffic 
        FROM 
          mcaptcha_sitekey_user_provided_avg_traffic 
        WHERE 
          config_id = (
            SELECT 
              config_id 
            FROM 
              mcaptcha_config 
            WHERE 
              KEY = $1 
              AND user_id = (
                SELECT 
                  id 
                FROM 
                  mcaptcha_users 
                WHERE 
                  NAME = $2
              )
          )

            WHERE

dcf0d4f9d803dcb1d6f775899f79595f9c78d466.query:
-- gets all unread notifications a user has
SELECT 
    mcaptcha_notifications.id,
    mcaptcha_notifications.heading,
    mcaptcha_notifications.message,
    mcaptcha_notifications.received,
    mcaptcha_users.name
FROM
    mcaptcha_notifications 
INNER JOIN 
    mcaptcha_users 
ON 
    mcaptcha_notifications.tx = mcaptcha_users.id
WHERE 
    mcaptcha_notifications.rx = (
        SELECT 
            id 
        FROM 
            mcaptcha_users
        WHERE
            name = $1
        )
AND 
    mcaptcha_notifications.read IS NULL;

f330cb94c53d33495df94aacec7e4e91d8a92074.query:
INSERT INTO mcaptcha_levels (
            difficulty_factor, 
            visitor_threshold,
            config_id) VALUES  (
            $1, $2, (
                SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config WHERE
                key = ($3) AND user_id = (
                SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $4
                    )));
